title: Game Demos and Playable Exhibits
description: Offering attendees the chance to play demos of upcoming or newly released games is a central attraction. Conventions provide a wide range of games for hands-on experience.

title: Developer Panels and Q&A Sessions
description: Gaming conventions often host panels and sessions where game developers and industry experts discuss game development, share insights, and answer questions from attendees.

title: Esports Tournaments
description: Many conventions feature competitive esports tournaments with professional and amateur players competing in popular games. These tournaments can have significant prize pools and attract a dedicated esports audience.

title: Tabletop Gaming Areas
description: In addition to video games, conventions often provide areas for tabletop gaming, where attendees can play board games, card games, and role-playing games.

title: Arcade and Retro Gaming Zones
description: Dedicated areas with classic arcade games and retro consoles allow attendees to enjoy nostalgic gaming experiences.

title: Live Streaming and Content Creation Studios
description: Some conventions provide spaces and equipment for content creators to livestream, record videos, and create content during the event.
